site.description: Reflectify is a small Eclipse plugin that offers Quick Assists for "reflectifying" class, instance, method and field accesses. The quick assists are enabled if an expression or a statement is selected in the Java editor.

category-def.name: org.wloka.reflectify.site
category-def.label: Reflectify Refactoring
category-def.description: Reflectify is a small Eclipse plug-in that offers Quick Assists for "reflectifying" class, instance, method and field accesses. The quick assists are enabled if an expression or a statement is selected in the Java editor.
